comments.author: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.creator: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.text: I have 5 pinned tabs, and tons of other tabs open.  I closed my 7th tab, and the favicons for a few of my other tabs were corrupted seemingly by a yellowish background added to them.  I managed to reproduce this two times, but I still don't know how to reproduce it reliably.
comments.raw_text: I have 5 pinned tabs, and tons of other tabs open.  I closed my 7th tab, and the favicons for a few of my other tabs were corrupted seemingly by a yellowish background added to them.  I managed to reproduce this two times, but I still don't know how to reproduce it reliably.
